author: Eric Amato

review: The device is easy to install, even for a technophobe like me.  Once I figured out my Wifi password, I was in business. I do like the films and  series (e.g. "Justify") that are included with the Amazon Prime package.  A couple of cautionary notes:  not all movies in the Amazon library are "free," only those categorized as part of the Amazon Prime package.  Other films, especially new releases will require a fee to watch.  New releases are more expensive than older films.  Secondly, if you want to play games you will need to purchase the game console.  The remote that comes with the Fire-Stick is great for surfing but not so good for playing games.
